content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: prismarine_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "emerald", "quantity": 19, "index": 13}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone", "quantity": 8, "index": 18}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 9, "index": 21}, {"type": "pink_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "brick_wall", "quantity": 15, "index": 31}]
thought: To craft prismarine bricks I need to place 9 prismarine shards in a 3x3 square in the crafting grid. The first shard should go in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: Now I need to put another shard in slot 2, which is next to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 2 with quantity 1
